content: christmas time is near and in that spirit i created these fun little trees pictured on the left and right to make them you will need aprox 125 meters of a worsted weight yarn polyfil and double pointed needles the taller tree is aprox 16 cm and the shorter tree is aprox 13 cm no gauge is given so sizes will vary the pattern is pretty simple they are knit from the top down and shaped by increases this pattern has not been tested so if you find any errata please let me know merry christmas
